Thrive Home Builders

Three Distinct Collections

Concord Patios: 1,811-3,569 SQ FT* | 2 – 5 BEDS | 2 – 4.5 BATHS
Harmony Courtyards: 1,647 – 3,242 SQ FT* | 2 – 3 BEDS | 2 – 4.5 BATHS
Parkview Townhomes: 1,476-2,379 SQ FT* | 2 – 3 BEDS | 2-3.5 BATHS

Live comfortably and healthy in a new home that integrates the latest technology and sustainable, locally-sourced products. Thrive Home Builders in Sonders Fort Collins offers three collections, including two collections of single-family homes and one collection of single-level townhomes, with designer-curated finish options. Home pricing will be available in Fall 2022. *All square footages listed are approximate.

Thrive Home Builders Sales Office + Design Center:
1935 Squib Lane | Fort Collins, CO 80524

Hours of Operation
MON – FRI: By Appointment Only

SAT – SUN: 12-5pm

Bridgewater Homes

Ranch style single-family new homes

Approx. 3,200 - 5,178 sq ft | 2 - 3 beds | 2 - 2.5 baths 

Combining quality, efficiency, and variety to reflect your individual style and preferences. Bridgewater Homes in Sonders Fort Collins offers single-story homes that are EnergyStar® certified to save you money and minimize your environmental footprint.
